sentences.en: As they walked along, they looked expectantly about them and chatted among themselves.
sentences.cn: 他们一面走, 一面东张西望,又时时交换一两句简单的话语.

sentences.en: Everyone looked overjoyed but no - one spoke: they just turned and looked expectantly at Sun Chi - jen.
sentences.cn: 大家脸上都有喜色,却是谁也不开口,都把询问的眼光射住了 孙吉人.

sentences.en: Gatsby started to speak, changed his mind, but not before Tom wheeled and faced him expectantly.
sentences.cn: 盖茨比刚开口说话, 又改变了主意,想闭上嘴巴, 但汤姆也转过身来面对着他等他说.

sentences.en: He at her expectantly, and with a wave of her blue - tipped fingers, she at him on.
sentences.cn: 他期待的看着她, 她染成蓝色的指甲摇摆着, 示意他继续.

sentences.en: Its five salesmen were waiting expectantly behind the counter.
sentences.cn: 那边的四五个店员一字儿摆在柜台前,等候做买卖.

sentences.en: Men listened to me expectantly, waiting in silence for my counsel.
sentences.cn: 人听见我而仰望 、 静默等候我的指教.

sentences.en: Planting her case on the table, she looked at us expectantly.
sentences.cn: 她把箱子稳稳地放在桌子上, 用期待的目光看着我们.

sentences.en: Planting his case on the table, he looked at us expectantly.
sentences.cn: 他把箱子在桌子上放稳, 以期待的目光望着我们.

sentences.en: She - I - we - expectantly to the door.
sentences.cn: 她 —— 我 —— 我们 —— 我们同时转向门.
她用期待的眼光看着我.

sentences.en: Tania: Why is your dog whining and looking at you expectantly?
sentences.cn: 坦尼亚: 你的狗为什么嗷嗷直叫,一副期待神情望着你?

sentences.en: The cashier was looking expectantly at Jean.
sentences.cn: 收银员正在期待地看着简.
安静的人群充满期待地等待着.

sentences.en: The students were all waiting expectantly with grins on their faces.
